content: If you have tried various stress-reducing techniques and are still feeling overwhelmed, it may be helpful to seek the assistance of a mental health professional. A licensed therapist can work with you to identify the root causes of your stress and anxiety, help you develop coping strategies, and provide support as you navigate through challenging situations. You can search for a therapist locally or find an online therapist to work with if that option is more convenient for you. Additionally, reaching out to a trusted friend or family member for support can help ease the burden of stress and anxiety.
